name: Doki Doki Laboratory Club
description:
Doki Doki Laboratory Club  is a short Visual-Novel type game I made with a friend for a college Physics project! The task was to create a creative lab report for our friction lab, and we decided to make a game! I did the coding and writing, while my friend Eclipse_Legends re-edited some of the sprites. 

You can find some of her work here! https://www.instagram.com/eclipse_legends/
